ygData.subject: Re: EQ slang
ygData.msgSnippet: You know, bandying about the phrase bannable offense just smacks of the powerhungry, play-as-I-play mentality I forementioned.  Big frickin deal!! Any game
ygData.messageBody:
You know, bandying about the phrase "bannable offense" just smacks of the
powerhungry, play-as-I-play mentality I forementioned. Big frickin' deal!!
Any game where you can be banned for doing something that does NO HARM to
anyone but a make-believe creature is inane to begin with and hardly worth my
time. Should I get banned I will shed not a tear and Verant will simply do
without my subscription dollars. I have confronted GMs with this very
proposition yet I remain playing. Wonder why that is??

Cooter the *cheater*
21st for now
